description:
###### 50% Off #####
•	Using this application you can calculate more than 25 classic physics calculations.
•	This app also providing all information about the calculation like formula, description etc...
•	This app contains the most useful  physics calculators like 

*   Amount of substance (n)
*   Angular Acceleration
*   Apparent porosity
*   Battery Charger
*   Battery life
*   Sheet Metal Bend Allowance
*   Bend To Mold Line Distance
*   Brinell Hardness Number
*   Paper Calculator GSM
*   Centripetal Acceleration
*   Centripetal Force
*   Circular Velocity
*   Average Velocity
*   Displacement or Distance
*   Velocity
*   Storage Capacity for Cylindrical Tank
*   Density
*   Horse Power
*   Kinetic Energy
*   Law of Cooling
*   Newton's First Law of Gravity
*   Newton's Second Law of Motion
*   Physical Pendulum
*   Sound Wave Length
*   Young’s Modulus
*   Voltage Divider
*   Weight/Force
*   Work
*   Elastic Potential Energy
*   Strain.

•	Calculations are very accurate and easy to use.
